result.name: Genotype-by-sequencing for trypanosome GWAS and population genomics analysis in tsetse fly Glossina fuscipes in Uganda
result.description: This dataset represents data used to complete genome-wide association (GWA) analysis with field-caught Glossina fuscipes fuscipes using ddRAD-seq to identify autosomal versus sex-chromosomal regions of the genome with data from 96,965 SNPs, and conducted a GWA with a subset of 50,960. autosomal SNPs from 351 flies.
